articles.title: Watch: 'Avatar' director James Cameron shares how his dreams inspire his films | CNN
articles.description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria speaks with Oscar-winning filmmaker James Cameron, the mind behind some of the highest grossing movies of all time like "Avatar" and "Titanic," about how his dreams inspired his iconic films.

articles.author: Christian Holub
articles.title: What's leaving Netflix in April 2023: New Girl, Scott Pilgrim, Ash vs. Evil Dead, and more
articles.description: Check out the full list of movies and TV shows leaving the streaming service next month.
articles.content: Spring is finally here, but, just as the seasons change, so do the offerings on our favorite streamers. As usual, Netflix will be shaking off a number of movies and TV shows in April to make room for… [+1223 chars]

articles.author: https://www.engadget.com/about/editors/mariella-moon
articles.title: Netflix hopes making fewer original movies will make them better | Engadget
articles.description: Netflix Film chief Scott Stuber reportedly decided to cut down on the titles the service is releasing this year so he could ensure that the division is producing more high-quality projects..
articles.content: Netflix released at least one movie a week over the past two years, but for 2023, the company is changing course. According to Bloomberg, the streaming giant is restructuring its movie division and r… [+1987 chars]

articles.author: Collier Jennings
articles.title: Best Action Movies on Netflix Right Now (September 2022) - IGN
articles.description: These are the best action movies on Netflix right now -- blockbusters, fight films, animated adventures and shootouts galore.
articles.content: There is nothing like a good action movie on Netflix. The perfectly choreographed fight scenes that let you feel every punch and kick on screen; the shootouts that see bullets and bodies hitting the … [+11394 chars]
